channel.title: Comments on: The Genesis Effect
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description: You already are a dream facilitator/creator. You just aren't getting paid in coin for it... :)
item.content:encoded:
You already are a dream facilitator/creator. You just aren’t getting paid in coin for it…

item.title: By: Pombroll
item.dc:creator: Pombroll
item.description: It's a virtue of selfless and confident people to create something greater than themselves for the benefit or enjoyment of others. I salute you for being one of those gifted people.
item.content:encoded: It’s a virtue of selfless and confident people to create something greater than themselves for the benefit or enjoyment of others. I salute you for being one of those gifted people.
